A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Visually the movie had many points that I enjoyed. The lightsaber battle with Rey and Ran was one of my favorite parts. However after that it all goes downhill\, so many plot holes in this movie if it were a ship it would be the Titanic. I really was left disappointed at the end of this one and I went into it really hopeful. Rogue One was an awesome movie and I had hoped this one would top the previous.
